thread.title: Robin

author: Robin
title: Robin
text:
I purchased a shower system from Hudson Reed at a great price. After ordering, I discovered a similar model on sale on Amazon for less. There was no problem in cancelling the order and ordering the cheaper model. The system arrived ahead of schedule (within 6 days). As it had a trim plate that was not large enough for my installation I returned the smaller one for a larger trim plate. The return and refund was expedited with excellent customer service.
All in all I am quite impressed with the quality of the product and the service.
